name: deluhi
text:
/u/hungryroy - Check your profile in the main menu, see if you have the handshake icon like in the image: https://i.imgur.com/9i1lRPB.png

If you quit during matches a few times you end up losing the handshake icon and you get a Reaper Icon and it takes longer to find matches. They did this to prevent people from quitting the game when they are losing.
